body:
So, if you haven't already found out I've been banned permanently. At first I didn't agree with it but now after the evidence was provided I saw that I deserved it.

Don't really want to say thank yous but I will seeing I'm not having any contact with Avicus until 6 months.

Thanks Yous:

Qrysis:

You guys are like my family, I couldn't ask for anything more then what you've done. You all have done me proud and we grew a lot together and we became closer along the way.

Elsa:

You've been a great friend from the start, you always seemed to be the only one who actually gave a fuck about me. Even though we just had a huge argument I couldn't ask for a better friend!


Bustah:

You're one of the greatest people I've ever met and got to talk to. Recently you've helped me out a lot with my problems and I can't thank you enough for that.
 
Iron: Even though you banned me I still show a lot of respect for you. You're a pretty chill guy even though we hated each other in the past <3

Rilo:

First ever Aussie friend! But seriously you were like a brother to me. We may have always fought but we made up and stuck together through all the shit that was thrown at us.

Jackson:

You're a pretty chill guy and helped me with my problems as well. You taught me how to become a good leader, and how to get through life.

Apollo:

You've been like a "second" family to me I guess because I've made friends with all of you pretty much and I wish I could stay but I can't.

Staff Team:

Sorry for my recent behavior. I know I shouldn't have done what I did and it's my fault. Hope you can forgive me when/if I come back.


There are to many to thank so I just thanked the people who are really close to me, but even though you weren't on my list I will still miss all of you. I may be on ts here and there and maybe the forums but not a lot.


Cya, Dawson.

replies.body:
Hey man, i barely know you.

Just to tell you, this is a lesson learnt. I hacked on this server two years ago, and was banned. For two years, all I did was continue on with life. Trust me, it will de-addict you from this game everyone can't let go and won't admit to it.

I got de-addicted from this game after my ban, all I can tell you is, enjoy what life will throw at you.

Listen as your day unfolds
Challenge what the future holds
Try to keep your head up to the sky
Lovers, they may cause you tears.
Go ahead, release your fears

replies.body:
A poem for you. You left physically, but will always be here mentally and spiritually. Here's a poem for you, thee shan't be forgotten.

Roses are red 
Violets are blue
I suck ass
So do you 

The first day I came
You asked me for fame
I panicked and ran
As you stayed and tanned 

As life went on 
Qrysis was turned on
It became so lit
I fought a fish

Sadly before I go
There's one thing you should know
I'm the hoe from Idaho
That you used to know


Thank you for your time everyone. *claps*
